articles.description: "We have to fight against the odds of a racist system stacked against us and designed for us to fail from before we are born."

articles.author: Terri-Ann Williams
articles.title: BBC newsreader George Alagiah reveals bowel cancer has spread – the five early warning signs you need to k - The Sun
articles.content:
BBC news reader George Alagiah today revealed his bowel cancer has spread, after he was first diagnosed with the illness in 2014.
The 64-year-old was diagnosed with bowel cancer a second time in 201… [+5117 chars]

articles.author: Neela Debnath
articles.title: Inbetweeners axed: Has The Inbetweeners been cancelled? Has it been taken off Netflix? - Express.co.uk
articles.description: THE INBETWEENERS is a popular British comedy series following the lives of four teenage boys. The series aired on Channel 4 and became a huge hit but has The Inbetweeners been cancelled and has it been taken off Netflix?
articles.content:
Many fans have been questioning if the foursome could be coming back together in the future for a reunion but this is yet to be announced.
Last year, Channel 4 aired a special clip show called The I… [+1024 chars]
